shares-based accounting, external rebasing balanceOf Key mechanics: - _shares[account]: Fixed internal accounting (only changes on transfer/mint/burn) - balanceOf(account): Returns shares \u00d7 NAV This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier."},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. decreaseAllowance(address,uint256).details: Atomic decrease to avoid race conditions

params.subtractedValue: Amount to subtract from current allowance

params.baselineNAV: NAV per share at baseline (e.g., when deposited)

increaseAllowance(address,uint256).details: Atomic increase to avoid race conditions

params.addedValue: Amount to add to current allowance

returns.isStale: True if NAV oracle reports stale data

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pause().details: Can only be called by owner in emergency situations

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

proxiableUUID().details: Implementation of the ERC1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.threshold_: Threshold in USD (18 decimals), 0 to disable

setStalenessSettings(bool,bool).details: Recommended: enforce_=true, revertOnStale_=false for graceful degradation      For maximum safety: enforce_=true, revertOnStale_=true

params.revertOnStale_: If true, revert on stale NAV; if false, use $1.00 fallback

totalSupply().details: Returns total shares  NAV per share

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unpause().details: Can only be called by owner

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

enforceNavStaleness().notice: Whether to enforce NAV staleness checks

getAccountDetails(address).notice: Get account details including shares and rebased balance

getAccruedYield(address,uint256).notice: Get yield accrued compared to a baseline NAV

isNavStale().notice: Check if NAV is currently stale

largeTransferThreshold().notice: Threshold for large transfer alerts (in USD, 18 decimals)

revertOnStaleNav().notice: Behavior when NAV is stale: true = revert, false = use fallback ($1.00)

setLargeTransferThreshold(uint256).notice: Set threshold for large transfer monitoring

simulateBalanceAtNAV(address,uint256).notice: Calculate expected balance after NAV change

treasuryVault().notice: Treasury vault (only address that can mint/burn)
